name: The Race for the White House
description: Play as a real-world candidate and completely immerse yourself into the battle of the US presidential election! Travel around the United States, try to woo voters across the country, create your own political agenda, skillfully manage your campaign budget... and perhaps you will be the next White House occupant!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 10, 8, 7, Vista, XP Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: All cards Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10, 8, 7, Vista, XP Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia or AMD with 512 Mb ram Storage: 2 GB available space
